评论详情: This is one of the most comfortable T-shirts I have ever used! It's perfect for my kickboxing class where you need to move freely and in a comfortable way. The fabric quality is excellent and it is very soft, the color is lighter than the photo but I don't mind, and it perfectly fits my petite frame. For reference, I'm 5.1 and 93lbs. It's great value for money! I'll be buying more from this brand.

This top is so comfortable and cute with lots of pretty colors to choose from. The back is different and I got so many compliments on this top. I ordered the XS….my usual size… and it’s a perfect fit.  Also, so affordable compared to some brands.

Cute top that I ordered to play tennis in.  It is very cute and fit well, but wrinkles very easily.  Must be ironed.  Also, it does not wick moistier, so I will not be wearing it to play tennis, but can wear it for yoga or walking.

This top is light and soft, super comfortable and airy. My gym is to warm and I wanted light workout tops. These are perfect. I’m ordering more colors! I’m 5’11” 163 pounds and a medium is just right. I love the material, I was afraid they’d be boxy with thick material but it’s the opposite. It lays just right with out being form fitting or tight.
This is a cute style but the fabric is very thin and came very wrinkled
I bought the small and it runs true to size. The material feels great, it fits great, and it makes me look and feel great while I’m working out. I love this too!
This tank is very comfortable and lightweight. I wear it often while playing pickleball and it keeps me cool. It’s stretchy and I love the material and color. Want to purchase more in other colors!
I loved the top, it is soft and feels comfortable, it runs a little large on me, I'm 34A, and it's a little big on my bust.
It’s so cute showing a little skin in the back. The fit is accurate. It’s very comfortable to wear out as a casual top. I will be buying another color when winter is over
a bit thin but great color and soft
True size, good quality

评论概述: A early gift really nice top.
评论详情: So pretty perfect fit.
Perfect fit, color, and material

评论概述: Very cute style, runs a little small
评论详情: I love the style and cutout of this shirt. Wish the material was a little thicker and I would size up bc it runs a little small. I ordered a small but should have gotten a medium.

It’s soo soft and comfy. the high neck is very useful for being comfortable while workout out. The cute cut on the back of the top makes it feel little stylish.  However, after every wash it gets crumpled and looks like it needs an iron. Wish it was more like those fabric which needs no iron.

评论概述: Great but not for sweaty workouts
评论详情: I LOVE these tops - the style, the colors, the cut. The material leaves something to be desired unfortunately. If you sweat, this material is heavy and wet.

I really wanted to give this shirt 5 stars because I love the style and the way that it fits. However, be forewarned that the material does not wash well. I washed this on cold and air dried it, but the material became very stiff. Disappointing because the shirt is super cute and comfortable.
Really like the fit; great for workouts.

I love this workout shirt! I'm an avid lululemon, Athleta, and Alo girl but I hate spending a lot on white shirts. This shirt is perfect-- it fits me well, covers my boobs but shows off my arms and some back, and is cheap enough that I can get another when it gets grungey (I'm hard on my gym clothes!). I'm 5'4, 145lb, 32dd and XS fits perfectly.

Bought this top for working out.  It’s great!  Not too long and not a mid-riff.  When bending over for burpees or the like it stays down.  Also like that it dries quickly and is breathable.  Only flaw is it wrinkles easily, for working out not a deal breaker.  Will buy another in an another color.

评论概述: Snagged first time wearing to gym
评论详情: Quality is just meh, the shirt snagged the first time wearing in the gym.
So comfy, soft and flowy

评论概述: Nice cool top for pickleball play
评论详情: Like the design. Love that it is airy. Just over priced

I love these tops!! I originally bought two after a friend recommended them and then bought three more after I got the first two. I absolutely love them! They are so comfortable and super flattering! I love wearing these to work out!
Cute top but it’s very thin and wrinkles easily True to size

First time buying o e of these flowy back style tops and it feels great wearing while hiking or biking with the flowy fit that doesn’t stick to your back when you get sweaty. Love the conservative neckline, and I needed something colorful when I’m hiking or biking roads. Wish they had more bright colors. I got the blue, size medium as usual. I will purchase more.
These are so comfortable and so flattering. I now have 3 and plan to buy more. Love working out in these.
Nice top. Very light and fresh. Love the back. It will wrinkle easily. The material is thin.
The fabric and color are great! The material is very soft. It runs small, definitely go up a size at least
So soft and good quality! I love this top for going to kickboxing
Such a flattering top! Loose in the front, contrary to most workout tank tops these days. Wore with tighter fitting shorts and it looked amazing. Appreciate the open back for a cool breeze.
I like the fit but beware of sweat showing

I love this tank I ordered a medium and I am a bit chesty and it fit perfectly. The material is so soft. I love the back detail. I have another similar style tank that rides up in the front because there is no support and this tank that does not happen. I would recommend the tank and I. Fact I will probably buy more colors. I love the lighter pink color that I got.

I love this too for working out or casual wear. It’s longer in the front for those that want their belly covered. Good quality fabric that’s soft and comfortable. Love the purple color. washes and hold up well.
Fits true to size, this top is exactly what I was looking for. It is flowy and fairly open in the back for air flow at the gym. The material is so soft! I am 5'7 , 145lbs. I ordered a medium.

I was looking for a cute workout top and liked the style of this one. When I opened the box I was surprised by how cheap the fabric looked and felt. It wasn't soft and it was very thin - almost see-through. I got a medium and the top was way too short but gaped in the arms. I rarely send anything back but I took this back almost immediately. A few times washing it and it would be toast.
I own a few different colors. Cute, soft material, true to size.

Exactly as expected. I sized up (M to L) based on the recommendations of other reviewers and it fits perfect. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and comfortable. I would buy again and would order in more colors.

I bought this tank knowing the neckline would be high, but it is above the collarbone, touching your neck at all times. So if you don't like things touching your neck - skip it. The open back is also super open back - like imagine a crop top but only on the back side. Super soft material though.
Soft , well made
Love this top! It’s soft and comfy. Only thing is if you’re doing a HIIT workout with it. It will fly.  It doesn’t stay down. Probably best for walking, running or a weight class.
My favorite workout tank. Breathable and not hot, also cute! Lightweight, so it is a little see through but just wear a sports bra and it looks fine. Fits to size
Loved this top but the medium was huge . Material was soft and color was great. Returned to get a small. Always hit and miss with sizing on Amazon!
Love this top. It’s light and airy and on me it is not cropped in the front ( 5’2 100 lbs) ordered Xsmall.  Flattering,  ordered 2 more colors.

I really like the design of this top and it is very comfortable. My only issue is how wrinkled the material gets. I know it’s just for working out but, I mean, have it folded in a draw it really needs to be totally flat or that thing looks like it just came out of the washer. Otherwise, serves the purpose.
Simple, soft, flattering! I love this shirt & intend to buy more colors.

Top arrived on time for event I had, and I love the comfort. I didn’t like that it wrinkles pretty bad after a wash/dry. All good though, it worked and it’s a workout tank so doesn’t matter if it was wrinkled.
This is perfect for my barre workouts. Super soft fabric, crop but perfect length for me 5’3”. Will be ordering more colors

评论概述: Too short wrap doesn’t cover in the back.
评论详情: Love this brand and fabric but it’s too short and the wrap in the back barely covers. I turned around and bought 6 more without the wrap back.
I feel cute in it, but the way the fabric feels, I suspect it is not meant to last long
Cute
Material is cotton and gets pretty wet when I workout.
Love it . Washes well.
She really likes the style and feel

评论概述: Cute! Great fit! True to size.
评论详情: Cute! Great fit! True to size
This too is perfect for summer! It’s lightweight, cute, fits perfect, and is a great soft material! I purchased the same shirt in multiple colors and I am so happy I did!
I loved the fit!! My only regret is not getting more colors. I’m a big chested girlie, size XL and this fit great
I am so happy I purchased this top! It is perfect for working out. It is comfortable and flattering. It is true to size. I am 5’5 and 120. I bought a small.

I bought one, loved it so much that I bought another in a different color. Now I have 5 and can’t decide which color I need to buy next. I wear them everyday for work (I’m a race horse exercise rider). They keep me cool and comfortable and the look cute too! I’ve also been wearing them out and about. They are cute enough to be much more than a work out top and the crop is not all that short in the front so it’s plenty conservative for going out to dinner or to a family gathering. I’m 5’1” weigh 105 and the xs fits perfect.
This top is so out of my comfort zone but it gives good coverage, light weight, and moves really nicely.  Very satisfied with this top and the color is beautiful.

评论概述: Patchy color on all 3 tops I ordered
评论详情: It’s a nice top but safely the colour is really patch so it looks like stains. Thought it may have been a one off but all three tops were like that, looks like a very bad dye job
Perfect top for yoga!
Sized up because I’m pregnant but so comfty and flattering
The quality and fit was ok
This shirt fit true to size, and is perfect for working out. I receive so many complements whenever I wear it.
As described. Very soft fabric. Fits great, wrinkles easily. Very breathable for running. Would purchase again.
Nice fit and looks great!

I really do like this top.  It is very soft and comfortable.  I'm 54, so I wouldn't wear it out and about but it will be perfect for me doing yardwork.  I love the color, it was true to the picture.  Overall, I really like it!
Wore this for a salsa class and it was very comfortable.
I’m 128lbs 5’ 2” and I ordered this in an XL so it does run small but it’s casual dressy and well made!

Bought one to try, immediately purchased three more colors when there was a price drop. The fabric feels like an airy dream, no cling. Need to pack light for an upcoming trip to a hot destination so these tops will be perfect space savers while color options will add some variety. Would recommend, would buy again. MEASUREMENTS: 5'3, 117 Lbs, 36C, bought size MEDIUM.
The red color skews slightly to the orange shade of red, but I love how this tops flows! I had to go one size up for the chest area. Happy with it otherwise.
Not true to size- fits loosely

The size was accurate and the fit was just like the pics. I got the white and light grey colors. I think they look best with high-waisted bottoms like my Barre tights. Soft material too. I don't put them in the dryer - I hang to dry and they don't shrink. Wrinkles come out easily.

评论概述: Perfect for workouts love this shirt
评论详情: Love color and especially love fit
Love this shirt! Ordered in grey and perfect! Great length, great coverage, not too heavy, and NOT too short like so many are. Will get more colors.

I really like he lavender color. The shape of the back is definitely flattering, howeve, this top isn't cool enough for me to work out in – I need more cut out. BTW, I always make my trainer bring a fan over – I don’t like to be hot while lifting weights. I pretty much only wear this around the house in the summer. Maybe I'll wear it in the winter to work out?
I LOVE these! Will be buying in every color :)
Cute too but it stays wrinkled. Would return if I could.

It is nothing special. I am not sure I Cecil wear it to my Pure Barre, because during some exercises it will be hanging on the front. Honestly, I have more comfortable and attractive tops than this for the same amount of money.

Very short, very open, very high and tight neck. It was one of the weirdest shirts I've ever worn, and as a chunky girl, I've had my fair share of poor fitting shirts. I really wanted to like this, but it just isn't for me.
Cute and lightweight
Love this material, so buttery soft and flattering. Will be getting more in different colors
Washed it once and it was done.
I need a workout shirt that breathes but doesn’t let the world know I’m working so hard. This one shows sweat and stays wet.  It’s very cute. Great casual shirt, but not recommended for sports.
Super soft and flattering. Great workout staple for those who don’t want to expose their stomach but want to look cute.
True to size. Fabric flows. Releases wrinkles fairly well. The cut is very cute in the back but still conservative. Light weight and breathable. It does show sweat more through the color than white.
This hits about mid waist. Has high neckline.

Super cute! I've purchased other colors of this after getting my first one. I'm usually a medium and that's what I purchased. I'd say it's true to size, but just be aware it does hit the very top of my high wasted shorts.
Great workout tank. Airy and comfortable
Great summer top for working out in or even with some fun summer shorts for going out. Super comfy and washes up nice. Just fry a few minutes and then hang up.
This is one of my favorite shirts. Although when I washed it, it shrunk. The fit and comfort are top notch
Definitely buying more colors!
I ordered an xl and it’s laughably small. Would not buy this unless you’re very thing or small
This is a cute top but very inexpensive material so it's way over priced. I haven't washed it yet so I'm not sure how it will hold up or if it shrinks.
I’ve ordered a lot of  Mippo’s workout  top , I love them the material , fit and the style. I have actually ordered almost all the colors.
Super cute and comfortable. Love it so much I ordered 3 more colors. So flattering so comfortable. 5’3 133 lbs small was perfect.
Cheap material… wrinkles easy.
Flattering. Keeps you cool during workouts.
I get lots of compliments on this pretty color of purple.
